mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE_NUM, LOGIN_TYPE, USER_ROLE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DATE FROM users WHERE user_role <> 'ADMIN' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE_NUM, USER_POST_NUM, USER_ADDRESS, USER_DETAIL_ADDRESS, LOGIN_TYPE, USER_ROLE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DATE FROM users WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_email = #{user_email}, user_phone_num = #{user_phone_num}, user_nickname = #{user_nickname}, user_address = #{user_address}, user_detail_address = #{user_detail_address} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
